name: Haulhive: A Mover's Mission
description:
Take on the role of a mover, navigate your client Leona - a kidnapped woman's apartment while texting with her, decipher clues, and confirm her distress without alerting her captor in this thrilling puzzle game.

- Features -

   Free text between you and the NPC client Leona. She is powered by OpenAI’s NLP model GPT-3.5 Turbo.

   A distinctive 2D black and white hand-drawn style level art transformed from 3D models. 

   First-person point-and-click puzzles.

- Credits -

   BrieYR : Programming, Technical Art, Level Art, Level Design, Narrative Design, Sound Design, Prompt Tuning

   HA7Oes : UI Art, Prompt Tuning

This is an experimental prototype. We are trying to utilize the recent trending tool ChatGPT to enhance the most essential and captivating aspect of gaming - interactivity. Hoping it can help providing a unique and immersive experience. If you have any thoughts or feedback, please feel free to tell us. We're still experimenting with how to better use NLP models in gameplay mechanics, and your feedback would be extremely helpful.
